Class BudgetRepository

Namespace
Model.Repositories
Assembly
Model.dll
Repository class responsible for performing CRUD operations on Budget entities. Inherits from GenericRepository<TObject> and implements IBudgetRepository.
public class BudgetRepository : GenericRepository<Budget>, IBudgetRepository, IRepository<Budget>
